metadata.feature_description: Search templates by name or localized name using keyword search

steps.expected: Templates page displays with search box and list of templates
steps.actual: Templates page displayed with search box and 6 templates visible

steps.expected: Only templates containing 'Cavalier' in the name should be shown

steps.action: Clear search and type 'Test' in search box
steps.expected: All templates containing 'Test' should be shown
steps.actual: 5 templates containing 'Test' are displayed: Test Template Page, Test Template Valid, Thumbnail Test Template, Workflow Test Template, and Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':".,.<>?/~` Special!
Empty list is displayed with no templates matching the search term

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Clear search to show all templates

steps.actual: All 6 templates are displayed: Cavalier - Main, Test Template Page, Test Template Valid, Thumbnail Test Template, Workflow Test Template, and Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':".,.<>?/~` Special!

steps.expected: Templates containing 'Cavalier' should be found regardless of case
steps.actual: 'Cavalier - Main' template is found using lowercase search term 'cavalier'

steps.action: Clear search and type single character 'W'
steps.expected: Search should filter results in real-time as user types
steps.actual: Typing just 'W' immediately filters to show 'Workflow Test Template' - real-time filtering confirmed with ~500ms debounce

observations: The search uses IndexOf with StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase for case-insensitive matching
Search has a 500ms debounce delay before triggering the API call (delayTime in templatesHierarchy.js)
Search matches against both TabName and LocalizedTabName fields in the backend
Templates with special characters (like Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':".,.<>?/~` Special!) are searchable without issues
